import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { retrieveAllToDos } from "./api/TodoApiservice" function ToDoListComponent() { const today = new Date() const targetDate = new Date(today.getFullYear()+12, today.getMonth(), today.getDay()) const [ToDos, setToDos] = useState([]) function refreshToDos() { console.log('called') retrieveAllToDos('in28Minutes') .then( (Response) => console.log(Response)) .catch( (Response) => console.log(Response)) setToDos(Response.data) } useEffect( () => { refreshToDos()} ) return(

Things You need to do

Id Description Status Target Date
{todo.id} {todo.description} {todo.done.toString()} {todo.targetDate.toString()}
) } export default ToDoListComponent
